name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mikeronomicon, Thorfinn, tttt, GeyserShitdick, regrepnsnefpoh, atticusonline, bob_lamonta, dropkickpikachu, SenseiHollywood, pogo)

name: saint
text: Beef is NOT always so quick to speak, and damn Pat for saying so.

name: professorhazard
text: Agree with me, friend, that Beef's wedding would be the perfect time for him to cold punch Pat in the face.

name: i_love_kate
text: Dude, spoiler warning.

name: dopamine
text: yeah geez dude, thanks

name: cracklewater
text: There is something quite skin-crawlingly vile about the sight of Pat wearing naught but shoes. He looks so much more nekkid than the completely unclothed Beef.

name: saint
text: I think this is necessary.

name: shinkusan
text:
Pat is, of course, being a total dick here. But I'd like to point out that he is such a dick about revving himself up for playing, and stopping everyone else from playing, that he is unintentionally allowing Ray to figure out what's going on and contact his doctor.

Pat's only not a dick when he is a dick. Accidentally.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
the face in panel four made this a five for me

also "hush! always so quick to speak, roast beef!"

name: the_voice
text: Panel four could be it's own self-contained thing and I would still laugh until I broke a few ribs.

name: atticusonline
text: Aren't you Pat?

name: deimosrising
text: It was Fredericksburg. You can mainly tell in the third bridge.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Knowing Pat, I would guess Cold Harbor. Total, senseless, slaughter.

name: lonestar52
text: Fredericksburg is totally senseless slaughter.  Ol' Burnsides just kept going...

name: nice-on-water
text: Antietam?

name: katal
text: I love panel six. Pat's attitude and Beef's reaction describe their characters very well.

name: direhaggis
text: Ray looks almost as bad as that one time in Hell. Throw the cat a bone, doc.

name: epicurus
text: Pat is such an asshole he thinks people will be able to tell which battle based on his damn banjo tune.

name: mortshire
text: he is so convinced of his ability to edutain it is asinine.

name: spinynorman
text: Pat is also such a dick because he accuses Roast Beef of being "quick to speak." If anything Beef never speaks because he's too busy putting together an introductory phrase that will minimize offense for everyone and draw as little attention as possible to himself. Usually he spends so much time putting it together that the person he wanted to introduce himself to has left to go make a sandwich.

name: epicurus
text: Damn, this strip may actually capture the fact that Pat is an asshole better than any other to date! It's at least in the top five.

name: invidious
text: Simply by the fact that it shows that Pat likes the banjo.  Only hella rude individuals force that instrument on other people.

name: tangles
text: i want to see that list of strips

name: atmus
text: His playing is pedantic and joyless.

name: mr_lostman28
text: who? James Iha?

name: ssddr
text: Poor diabetes, always getting a bad rep from Ray.

name: patkun
text: Pat is so eager to impress the guys with his descriptive banjo skills that he acts like a dick to get it. It's a vicious cycle.

name: endoftheworld
text: Panel four, man. Pat is SO ANGRY that you tried to play the banjo.

name: charchar
text: But panel 9, he looks so enthusiastic.

name: riazm
text:
Jesus, Pat has a fram where he doesn't say anything just stares. And then when Beef asks him if he knows how to play he tells him to hush.

Pat is a dick!

name: hendetta
text: Man I hardly ever see the cats' tails.

name: mygoodfriend
text: I was actually really hoping that Pat would be a genius banjo virtuoso.

name: frankieteardrop
text: i can think of few things worse than a james iha solo record.

name: buttermoths
text: I thought it said "...think of A few things..." and was going to be so very rude, asking such as "YEAH, WUT?"...but aaah, no, no, neither can I. Only Pat's solo banjo explorations and David Bowie's 'Tonight' album.

name: sp1derbaby
text: I'll bet one of those things is a second James Iha solo record. He's working on it apparently.

name: kingcrimson
text:

http://www.soundclick.com/bands/default.cfm?bandID=413759

And if you're interested, check out his posts on this forum here: http://forum.powertabs.net/viewtopic.php?f=36&t=32762&sid=af9020e1ed74f73b17408adab61db32d

name: thatcrazycommie
text: Awe, Beef looks so happy in th first panel.

name: laudabilis
text: Does no one else think that 24-hour colon cancer makes this comic the best thing ever? Because it does.

name: nigelchaos
text: The Alt-Text on this one kicks ass.

name: agentmuu
text: Actually, even Pat's asshole banjo playing isn't as bad as a James Iha album...

name: tekende
text: Pat clearing his throat there. Oh man. I just want to destroy him.

name: diggidy
text: Dang. Mrs. Andretti is about to overhear a very unpleasant phone call.

name: alzuna
text:
I hate how he thinks it's a treat to guess which battle, as if Roast Beef were excited at such a prospect, oh goody, which battle IS it?!

DAMN YOU PAT.

My boyfriend is named Patrick, and he is not a dick, Pat is a disgrace to other Pats.

name: mangtastic
text: As another Patrick, I concur.

name: biznart
text: Ray should know by now that if he wants Andretti's attention, he needs to close the door to the bathroom.  It's better than the Bat-signal, basically.

name: davep3rrett
text: man i actually really like james iha's solo album!

name: banjothepony
text: i agree! it's far from terrible!

name: sp1derbaby
text: Every panel is this strip is excellent. The little touches, the expressions, the timing. A clear 5.

name: king-jim
text: Pat's shoes are vile

name: carlyle
text: A restaurant. With. His. Mother.

name: greenkoolayd
text: O.V.I.O.U.S.L.Y.

name: greenkoolayd
text: SELF-PWNT

name: epicurus
text:
This is actually an excellent reference strip for showing how much of an asshole Pat is:

-He snatches away an instrument from someone else's hands while they learn to play. He does not own the instrument or the house he's in when he does this.

-After snatching it, he pauses to glare at Roast Beef, as if waiting for him to speak. When Roast Beef then politely asks him something, Pat hushes him.

-Pat is pretentious enough to think that a story about a boy who comes of age following his father's death could realistically have five distinct parts in an instrumental song. Think about it. There could be one part pre-death, the battle, and then afterward. How you would realistically subdivide it further than that without lyrics is the height of being a musical douchebag.

Sublime.

name: mordent42
text:
The way I see it Beef is being gently sarcastic by asking if Pat plays the banjo after Pat throws a hissy fit and snatches it off him - like how he asks Ray if he's sure he crashed the car a few strips back.

Oh Beef, you are as subtle as a 20 minute civil war epic isn't.

name: hendetta
text: I find it hilarious that Pat's mouth is agape in anger on panel four. He is just appalled.

name: hendetta
text: It is also pretty disgusting.
